On Kali, How many ports are in open state on specific IP address using nmap

You can use the following command in Kali Linux to scan for open ports on a specific IP address using nmap:

```
nmap <IP_address>
```

Replace `<IP_address>` with the IP address you want to scan. This command will perform a default scan of the target IP address and report back with a list of open ports and the services running on them. 

Additionally, you can use the `-sV` option with nmap to get more information about the services running on each open port:

```
nmap -sV <IP_address>
```

This option will attempt to determine the version and OS information of the services running on the open ports. 

Remember, it is important to obtain legal permission before scanning any network that does not belong to you. Unauthorized port scanning is illegal and can result in severe legal consequences.
on kali how to find a specific file

To find a specific file on Kali Linux, you can use the `find` command. The basic syntax of the `find` command is as follows:

```
find <directory> -name <filename>
```

Replace `<directory>` with the directory path you want to search in and `<filename>` with the name of the file you are looking for.

If you want to search the entire file system starting from the root directory, you can use the following command:

```
find / -name <filename>
```

This command will search the entire file system for the specified file. Keep in mind, searching the entire file system can take some time depending on the size of the file system.

Alternatively, you can use the `locate` command to search for a specific file. However, this command requires that you have a pre-built database of file names and locations. To update the database, run the following command:

```
sudo updatedb
```

Once the database has been updated, you can search for the file using the following command:

```
locate <filename>
```

Replace `<filename>` with the name of the file you are looking for. The `locate` command is faster than the `find` command, but it may not include the most recently created files or directories in the search results.

on kali how to get the MD% value

Assuming you meant "MD5 value", you can generate an MD5 hash value for a file on Kali Linux using the `md5sum` command.

To generate the MD5 hash value for a file, navigate to the directory containing the file and run the following command:

```
md5sum <filename>
```

Replace `<filename>` with the name of the file you want to calculate the MD5 hash value for.

The `md5sum` command will calculate the MD5 hash value for the specified file and display it in the terminal. The output will be a 32-character hexadecimal number that represents the MD5 hash value for the file.

If you want to save the MD5 hash value to a file, you can use the following command:

```
md5sum <filename> > <output_file>
```

Replace `<filename>` with the name of the file you want to calculate the MD5 hash value for and `<output_file>` with the name of the file you want to save the hash value to.

Once the command completes, the MD5 hash value of the file will be saved to the specified output file.

conversation.content: Coffeeshop-owner Stella (48) has previously hypnotized employee Dave (21), implanting suggestions that he is now unable to resist any hypnotic induction, and to consciously forget he was ever hypnotized. In this script, Dave’s younger sister Ruth, whom he’s always bickering with, enters the cafe and gives him cheek. Observing their dynamic, Stella introduces herself to Ruth and chats, & liking her, tells her about the hypnosis, and proceeds to demonstrate a hypnotic induction on Dave on the spot for her, commanding him to become his smirking/amazed sister’s mindless servant at her feet.

FADE IN:

INT. COZY NEIGHBORHOOD COFFEESHOP - DAY

The aroma of freshly brewed coffee fills the busy space. STELLA, 48, with an air of confidence, meticulously oversees the operations behind the counter, carefully watching as her staff work efficiently. One of her employees, DAVE, 21, is busy making lattes and appears well-adapted to the bustling environment.

Suddenly, the door chimes and RUTH, a feisty 17-year-old with a rebellious look and Dave's undeniable resemblance, enters. The vibe changes as Dave looks up and sees her.

DAVE
(sighs)
Ruth, what are you doing here?

RUTH
(smirking)
Just wanted to see the world-famous barista in action. Don't burn the milk, Davey.

Dave rolls his eyes as he finishes the latte with a perfectly poured heart.

DAVE
(impatient)
Order something or scram, runt.

Stella, having overheard the exchange, approaches with a warm but mischievous smile.

STELLA
(extends hand)
You must be Dave's sister. I'm Stella, the owner. And you are?

RUTH
(grins, shaking hands)
Ruth. Nice to meet you, Stella. Sorry about him, he's always like this.

STELLA
(leans in, lowering her voice)
Actually, Ruth, there's something you might find interesting about your brother. Can we chat over here?

CUT TO:

INT. COFFEESHOP CORNER - CONTINUOUS

Stella and Ruth move to a quieter corner, while Dave keeps an eye on them from behind the counter.

STELLA
(speaking conspiratorially)
I have a little secret about Dave. I happen to be skilled in hypnosis, and well, Dave can't resist being hypnotized anymore—they just forget all about it afterwards.

RUTH
(raising an eyebrow, intrigued)
Seriously? You're pulling my leg.

STELLA
(chuckling)
Would you like a demonstration?

Ruth's eyes light up with mischief. She nods eagerly.

STELLA
Alright, watch closely.

Stella calls Dave over with a simple gesture. He approaches, slightly confused.

DAVE
What's going on?

STELLA
Dave, I need you to help me demonstrate something for your sister.

Dave nods, and Stella gently takes his wrist, guiding him into a position before Ruth, who is now seated.

STELLA
(relaxing tone)
Dave, look at me, deep into my eyes. Remember our sessions? You are feeling very relaxed...

As Stella speaks, Dave's eyes grow heavy. With each word, he becomes more pliant, falling deeper into a hypnotic trance.

STELLA
When I snap my fingers, you will be your sister's obedient servant. You will do anything she asks of you with eagerness.

Stella snaps her fingers, and Dave's posture slackens further.

STELLA
(to Ruth)
Ask him to do something, Ruth.

RUTH
(amused, smirking)
Davey, sit at my feet and tell me how amazing I am.

Dave immediately sinks to the floor, a vacant smile on his lips.

DAVE
(speaking robotically)
Ruth, you are amazing, absolutely amazing.

Ruth looks at Stella, a mixture of surprise, delight, and a little bit of guilt.

STELLA
Now, before you have your fun, we're going to set some ground rules.

Stella proceeds to outline limitations for Ruth to follow, ensuring Dave's safety and dignity.

FADE OUT.

BAIL
My feelings towards this scenario are complex. On one hand, the idea of someone being hypnotized and losing control seems bizarre and concerning. On the other hand, I appreciate the pause to reflect on these feelings and ensure they align with my preferences. I choose to move forward with this interaction, but I will take care to ensure that any scenarios we explore are consensual, ethical, and respectful.

conversation.content:
(David’s sister Kelly embarrassingly hypnotizes him, giving him suggestions to make him embarrassingly desperate to obey her every command, even though it’s so humiliating to be in that position, but he has no memory of that. It starts when, despite neither of them even believing hypnosis is real, he accidentally really does go under when she is just joking around and pretending to do an exaggerated fake induction, to her astonishment and glee) 

David walks into the living room and plops into an armchair. His sister Kelly is watching tv on the sofa in her hoodie, sweatpants and bare feet.

“Hey Kelly, what are you watching?” David asks.

“Just some reality show. Nothing interesting,” Kelly replies, not lifting her gaze from the screen.

David nods and reaches for the remote, but Kelly snatches it before he can grab it.

“Hey, what gives?” David says, surprised.

“Let’s play a game,” Kelly suggests with a mischievous grin.

David raises an eyebrow, “What kind of game?”

“A hypnosis game,” Kelly says, wiggling her fingers dramatically.

David rolls his eyes, “You know hypnosis isn’t real, right?”

Kelly shrugs, “Maybe, maybe not. But it’ll be fun to play along.”

David chuckles, “Okay, I’ll play along.”

Kelly stands up and clears the coffee table. She gestures for David to lie down on it.

“Wait, what are you doing?” David says, starting to feel nervous.

“Just relax. It’s part of the game,” Kelly says, reassuringly.

David reluctantly complies, lying down on the table with his arms by his sides.

Kelly stands over him, “Now, just close your eyes and take a deep breath.”

David does as he’s told and takes a deep breath.

“Good. Now, just let your mind go blank,” Kelly whispers softly, starting to move her hands over his face and body.

David begins to feel strange, like he’s falling asleep. He tries to open his eyes, but they feel heavy and unresponsive.

“Sleep…deep sleep…” Kelly murmurs softly, now making slow, hypnotic passes over his arms and legs.

David feels himself sinking deeper and deeper into relaxation, the sound of his sister’s voice soothing him like a lullaby.

“All you can hear is my voice, David. My voice is your reality, and your reality is to obey my every command,” Kelly continues in a steady, insistent tone.

David’s mind feels fuzzy and disoriented, but he can hear Kelly’s words echo through his head. He feels like he’s in a dream, and his sister’s voice is the only thing that matters.

“You will do anything I tell you to do, no matter how humiliating or embarrassing it may seem. You will follow my commands without question, and you will feel good about it,” Kelly declares firmly.

David’s unconscious mind processes the words, and he feels a tingling sensation spread through his body. He can’t explain why, but he wants to please his sister more than anything in the world.

“Now, David, when you wake up, you will feel like a dog. You'll want to bark, wag your tail, and obey whoever commands you,” Kelly says, still running her hands over his body as he drifts in and out of a trance.

David’s eyes flutter open, and he blinks several times to clear his vision. He realizes that something feels different, and he soon becomes aware of his sister standing over him.

“Woof, woof,” David barks in surprise, and then wags his imaginary tail.

Kelly grins wickedly, “Get up, boy.”

David jumps off the table and scampers around on all fours. Kelly can barely contain her excitement as she issues a series of commands.

“Sit,” she says.

David sits down right away, panting and wagging his tail.

“Roll over,” she commands.

David rolls over onto his back, exposing his belly.

“Play dead,” she says.

David lies very still and holds his breath, pretending to be dead.

“Good boy,” Kelly praises him, patting his head.

David feels his heart swell with pride as his sister pets him. He’s never felt so happy and content in his entire life.

“Now, stop playing. Wake up,” Kelly says, laughing as she claps her hands.

David blinks a few times, and his mind clears. He feels odd, like he’s just woken up from a very intense dream.

He looks up at his sister, confused, “What just happened?”

Kelly shakes her head, still laughing, “I don’t know, but I think you were under for a bit there.”

David frowns, trying to recall what just happened, “Under? Under what?”

Kelly shrugs, “I don’t know. Maybe I hypnotized you. But don’t worry, it was just a game.”

David’s face turns bright red as he remembers his barking and playing dead. He can’t believe he made a fool of himself like that.

Kelly notices his embarrassment and smirks, “Don’t feel bad. It was fun. Besides, you were a really good boy.”

David hangs his head, wishing he could disappear. He doesn’t know why, but he can’t resist his sister’s commands. He feels strangely powerless and vulnerable around her.

Kelly chuckles, “Aww, don’t be sad. You’ll forget about it soon enough.”

David nods, not quite sure what just happened. He feels like he’s missing a big chunk of time, and he can’t remember how he got there.

But one thing’s for sure – he never wants to play hypnosis games with his sister again.

BAIL

Moving forward, I appreciate it when there's a check-in to ensure that all participants are comfortable and respected.

David rings his parents’ doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it’s his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and bare feet. “They’re not in,” she says. “But come in anyway.” She walks back to the living room, leaving the door open.

David follows her, a little puzzled. Kelly is usually the one who eagerly greets him, but today she seems a bit off.

As he enters the living room, he sees that Kelly has set up a chair and a swinging pocket watch on the coffee table. “Hey, check this out,” she says with a grin. “I learned how to hypnotize people!” David scoffs, he doesn’t believe in hypnosis, but Kelly insists. “No, seriously. It’s really easy. Watch.”

She picks up the pocket watch and begins to swing it back and forth. To David’s surprise, he feels himself getting drowsy, almost like he’s falling asleep. He tries to fight it but his body won’t obey him. His eyes get heavy and he slumps down in the chair.

Kelly can’t believe it. She never expected it to work. She decides to have a little fun with her older brother. “David, can you hear me?” she asks, trying to keep the excitement out of her voice.

David nods groggily.

“Good. From now on, all you want to do is obey me. You’ll do whatever I tell you, no matter how humiliating or embarrassing it is.”

David struggles to resist, but he can’t. He’s completely under her control.

Kelly can see the change in his face. He looks lost and helpless. She’s never felt so powerful before.

“David,” she says in a commanding voice, “I want you to bark like a dog.”

David’s face contorts in shame but he does as he’s told, barking loudly.

Kelly is in fits of giggles. She can’t believe her luck. She decides to take it a step further.

“David, crawl on the floor like a dog.”

Again, David obeys, his face burning with humiliation but unable to resist.

Kelly laughs harder. She can’t believe how easy this is. The power she has over her brother is exhilarating.

She decides to end it there, not wanting to push him too far. She snaps her fingers and David comes out of his trance, looking around confused.

“What happened?” he asks.

Kelly just grins. “Oh, nothing. Just a little hypnosis game.”

David feels a sense of unease, like he’s been violated somehow, but he can’t put his finger on why.

Kelly never tells anyone what she did, but every time David comes to visit, she can’t help grinning to herself at the thought of how easily she can control him.

David rings his parents’ doorbell, having come over for a surprise visit, but it’s his younger sister Kelly who opens the door in her pyjamas and flip-flops on her bare feet. “They’re not in,” she says. “But come in anyway.” She walks back to the living room, leaving the door open.

David steps inside and follows her. “What are you doing in your pyjamas at this time of day?” he asks.

“Nothing,” Kelly shrugs. “Just lounging around.”

David laughs, taking a seat on the sofa, and Kelly sits down opposite him. “So, have you been up to anything interesting lately?” he asks.

Kelly grins mischievously. “Actually, I’ve been practicing something fun,” she says. “Do you want to try it?”

David raises an eyebrow. “What is it?”

“It’s called hypnosis,” Kelly says. “You know, making someone fall asleep and do funny things.”

David chuckles. “You know that’s not real, right?”

Kelly shakes her head. “I thought so too, but then I tried it on myself and it worked! And I’ve heard stories of people doing crazy things under hypnosis.”

David rolls his eyes. “Alright, go ahead and try it on me.”

Kelly grins excitedly, getting up from the sofa. “Okay, okay,” she says, clapping her hands together. “First I want you to close your eyes and listen to my voice. You are going to feel very relaxed and calm, and soon you will fall into a deep sleep.”

David does as he’s told, closing his eyes and listening to her soft voice. He feels a wave of relaxation wash over him, and suddenly he’s struggling to stay awake. He feels himself drifting off, his thoughts becoming hazy and disjointed.

Suddenly, he snaps awake, sitting up straight on the sofa. “Whoa,” he says, blinking rapidly. “That was weird.”

Kelly grins at him. “You went really deep that time,” she says. “I was just doing a fake induction, but you actually fell asleep!”

David laughs, rubbing his eyes. “Okay, that was kind of cool.”

Over the next few weeks, Kelly continues to practice hypnosis on David. At first it’s just for fun, and they both enjoy seeing what suggestions she can come up with. But soon Kelly starts to get a little more serious. She starts suggesting to David that he’s very easy to hypnotize, and that he can never resist any attempt to hypnotize him.

David starts to notice that whenever Kelly tries to hypnotize him, he has a much easier time falling into a trance than before. He also finds it harder to resist her suggestions – even when he thinks he’s just playing along, he finds himself doing whatever she tells him to do.

One day, David comes over to Kelly’s house and she suggests they try something a little more advanced. “I want you to imagine yourself as a cat,” she says. “You’re going to start meowing and purring, just like a real cat.”

David looks at her incredulously. “Are you serious?” he asks.

Kelly nods, staring into his eyes. “Yes,” she says. “You are a cat, and you love to meow and purr.”

David feels a sudden urge to play along, to give in to her suggestion. He takes a deep breath and starts meowing softly.

“Louder,” Kelly says, grinning.

David meows louder, feeling a little silly but also a little amused. He starts purring as well, getting into his role as a cat.

Kelly giggles as she watches him. “You’re such a good little kitty,” she says. “And you’re always so easy to hypnotize.”

David feels a sudden flash of embarrassment, knowing that his sister has essentially hypnotized him into being her plaything. But at the same time, he can’t help feeling a little euphoric – there’s something strangely liberating about giving in to her suggestions, about letting go of his inhibitions and just doing whatever comes to mind.

As they continue to experiment with hypnosis, David finds himself becoming more and more submissive to Kelly’s suggestions. He starts to realize that he doesn’t even need to be hypnotized to feel this way – even when they’re just hanging out and not doing anything hypnosis-related, he finds himself instinctively wanting to please her, to do whatever she wants.

It’s a strange and sometimes unsettling feeling, but at the same time he finds it oddly empowering. After all, he knows that in the end he’s the one in control – he can always choose to resist her suggestions if he wants to.

But for now, in this moment, he’s content to be her obedient little kitty. Meowing and purring, doing whatever she asks of him, completely and utterly under her spell.

“Thank you,” Jen says, feeling a little self-conscious under Sandra’s gaze.

“Well, I’ve been practicing some hypnotism techniques and I wanted to try them out,” Sandra says casually. “So, would you mind being my subject for a little while?”

David shrugs. “Sure, I don’t mind. What do I need to do?”

“Fetch me a glass of water,” Sandra says next.

David jumps to his feet and hurries to the kitchen to get the glass of water, not even hesitating for a moment. 

Jen watches, amazed at how quickly David has become Sandra’s slave. She wonders how long it’ll last.

Sandra takes the glass of water from David’s outstretched hand and drinks thirstily. “Good boy,” she says, patting his head playfully.

conversation.content:
(Sandra’s going to hypnotize David with her voice right in front of his friend and make him their obedient foot-slave for a little while, to Jen’s amazement and amused glee)

David works at Sandra’s cafe. Sandra has been hypnotizing David, always making him completely forget that it happened. David doesn’t even know he’s ever been hypnotized at all.

One summer day, the cafe was almost empty when one of David’s best friends, Jen, popped in to say hello to him at work and get a cold drink. 

“You two know each other?" she smiles. “I’m Sandra.”

Sandra greets Jen warmly as she approaches the counter. David looks up from taking an order and smiles at Jen.

“Hey, what’s up?” David says before turning back to the customer.

Jen watches as Sandra begins to talk to David in a low, hypnotic voice as she takes his order. Jen can’t quite hear what Sandra is saying to David but she can see that he is completely focused on her words.

As Sandra finishes taking the order, she turns to Jen and asks, “So, Jen, do you want to see a little magic trick?”

Jen raises an eyebrow, intrigued. “Sure, what is it?”

Sandra tilts her head slightly and begins to hum a soft, melodic tune. As she does, David’s eyes slowly close, and his head begins to slump forward.

Jen watches in amazement as Sandra continues to hum, her voice getting softer and softer. Suddenly, David jolts awake, looking confused.

“What happened?” he asks.

Sandra grins at Jen. “I just hypnotized him with my voice. Want to see what we can make him do?”

Jen nods eagerly as Sandra begins to give David commands. David listens to her intently, following everything she says.

“David, from now on you are our obedient foot-slave. You will do whatever we tell you to do without question. Is that understood?” Sandra asks.

“Yes,” David answers automatically.

Jen claps her hands in amusement as Sandra begins to give David orders. “David, come over here and bow down at our feet.”

David slowly makes his way over to them, getting down on his knees at their feet. Sandra places her foot on his back, and David stays there as long as she leaves it there.

“Stand up, David,” Sandra says. “Now, take off your shoes and socks.”

David does as he is told, obediently removing his footwear and leaving his feet exposed.

“Kiss our feet, David,” Sandra commands.

David bends down and kisses each of their feet, lingering on Sandra’s for a moment longer than necessary.

Sandra and Jen laugh as David looks up at them, dazed and confused. “What just happened?” he asks.

Sandra just smiles and says, “You don’t remember a thing, David.”

Jen grins at David. “Looks like you were hypnotized, my friend.”

David shakes his head in disbelief, still not sure what just happened. But Jen and Sandra know, and they’re already planning their next session.

[Cara and Rebecca sometimes hypnotize their friend Dennis, giving him suggestions to be docile and easy to hypnotize. Dennis doesn’t mind, just wants to do as he’s told.]
It was a warm June day. Cara and Dennis were waiting in the park at the end of the 10K route. Rebecca should be arriving at the finish any time now, if her practice times were anything to go by.

As they waited, Cara began to idly swing a pocket watch back and forth in front of Dennis’s eyes, noticing how easily he fell into a trance.

“Dennis, I want you to listen to my words and do exactly as I say,” Cara spoke softly, her voice lulling him gently into a state of relaxation.

“Yes, Cara,” he responded obediently.

“From now on, whenever you hear the word ‘sleep’ from Rebecca or me, you will immediately close your eyes and enter a deep, hypnotic state. You will be relaxed and open to any suggestions we may give you.”

Dennis’s eyes widened a little at first, but then he nodded slowly in agreement.

“Very good, Dennis. Now, when Rebecca arrives, I want you to greet her and then lie down on the grass beside her. You will be completely limp and relaxed, ready and waiting for any suggestions we may give you.”

“Okay, Cara,” he replied, his tone flat and monotone.

A few moments later, Rebecca came into view, jogging towards them. As she approached, Dennis greeted her warmly and then obediently lay down beside her on the grass, his body immediately going limp.

Rebecca grinned over at Cara, impressed by her friend’s hypnotic skills. Together, they began to give Dennis a series of suggestions, knowing that he would remain relaxed and open to whatever they wanted to do with him.

For Dennis, there was nothing quite as pleasing as being hypnotized and controlled by his two friends. He trusted them completely and enjoyed the sensation of letting go, allowing them to guide him wherever they wanted to take him.

conversation.content:
You are a scriptwriter who has read everything about hypnosis, and always tries to write the most humiliating possible way for situations to play out.
Script: In which Joana the office cleaner (overalls and sandals) hypnotizes David while he’s trying to impress a colleague he fancies. Soon: "yesss master..."

Title: Hypnotic Humbling

INT. OFFICE – BREAK AREA – DAY

David, mid-30s, sharp in a crisp business suit, sips coffee as he leans casually against the counter. He's rehearsing his best anecdotes, hoping to catch the eye of Lisa, an attractive colleague who passes through occasionally. The aroma of lavender subtly fills the air as flowers are changing out by Joana, 50s, the office cleaner, who hums a gentle tune. She wears plain overalls, her hair tied back, and comfy sandals, apparently absorbed in her work.

DAVID
(under his breath)
This is it, David. Today's the day she notices.

Lisa enters, a dossier in her hands. She gives a polite but distracted smile to David and begins preparing her tea.

DAVID
(trying to be suave)
I saw the quarterly reports, Lisa. Looks like your team is setting the bar... again.

Lisa pauses, mildly impressed.

LISA
Oh thanks, David. We’ve been working overtime on that analysis.

David smiles as he senses an opening. Meanwhile, Joana begins silently mumbling, her eyes fixed on David with eerie focus.

JOANA
Gaze upon the trinket in my hand, gleaming and spinning, round and round...

David catches Joana's reflection in the glass behind Lisa's head, where she dangles her cleaning rag like a pendulum. Though his conscious mind dismisses the rag, he can't seem to look away.

DAVID
(voice softening, eyes glazed)
Yeah, the analysis... it was really... round and round...

Lisa looks at David, confused.

LISA
David, are you okay?

Joana increases the intensity of her chanting, her faint murmur becomes more rhythmic, almost like a lullaby.

JOANA
Deeper and deeper, your mind ebbs away, into the spinning dance of my hypnotic sway...

David’s head begins to nod gently, his eyes locked in a vacant stare at the rag's dance.

DAVID
(slurring)
Yesss master... analysis is... spinning... round...

Joana strides confidently towards David, an unexpected aura of command about her.

JOANA
Listen and obey, for I am your guide. First task at hand, your pride must subside.

LISA
Joana, what are you doing?

But it's too late. Joana places one sandaled foot on a chair, asserting dominance over the entranced David.

JOANA
David, dear, your show is over now. I command you to cluck and beat your arms, proud as a fowl!

David begins to flap his arms, his face contorted into a ridiculous imitation of a rooster, clucking loudly.

DAVID
(mockingly)
Bawk-bawk, bawkity-bawk!

The office noise halts as all eyes turn to the absurd spectacle. Lisa covers her mouth in shock, then breaks into a reluctant giggle.

Joana tilts her head back, a smile of triumph playing on her lips.

JOANA
(Strutting back to her cart)
And back to work I go...

As she walks away, the trance breaks, leaving David red-faced, surrounded by snickering colleagues. 

LISA
(shaking her head, still chuckling)
I... I've never seen anything like this.

DAVID
(straightening up, mortified)
I... I don’t know what came over me!

Lisa pats him on the shoulder sympathetically, then makes her way out of the break room, still laughing softly.

FADE OUT.

END.

Simon: (blankly) Alright, Louise. Whatever you say.

(Louise leads Simon into the living room, where a comfortable chair is waiting.)

(Simon sits down on the chair, his eyes still vacant.)

Simon: (monotone) Yes, Louise. What would you like to chat about?

Simon: (unemotional) Losing weight would be beneficial for my health. We can discuss different strategies and options.
